Sincerely,

We are happy to announce that we will be introducing a Friday Backpack Program through the 2019-2020 school year! The backpack program will include a variety of foods to provide meals for the students over the weekend. The backpack will be filled and delivered to students in their classrooms every Friday and will need to be returned with the student when he or she returns to school the following Monday. The backpacks will then be refilled for the next Friday. This program will begin in October and continue throughout the school year. This program is available to all students at Paragon. There is a form available in the office if you are interested in participating in this program. The form can be filled out and returned to the office.
